Therefore , goal study protocol provide insight sex difference cognitive aspect drug crave assess impact stress attentional bias drug-related cue well availability cognitive resource .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion include subject ages 1865 meet full DSMIV criterion marijuana dependence nondependent control . Exclusion criterion include medication may affect cognitive HPAaxis function Current depression Bipolar disorder Attention deficit hyperactivity disorder History psychosis Suicidal homicidal intent Significant cognitive deficit Dependence substance marijuana , nicotine , caffeine .
